SurveyQuestionResponse.name: SurveyQuestionResponse
SurveyQuestionResponse.description: Represents a participantâ€™s answer to a specific question.

ChoiceValue.description: Response provided by a participant for the following question types: Multiple choice Picklist Radio Ranking

Datatype.type: Filter, Group, Nillable, Restricted picklist, Sort

DateTimeValue.description: Response provided by a participant for a question of the type date time.

DateValue.description: Response provided by a participant for a question of the type date.

InvitationId.description: The ID of the SurveyInvitation that was sent to the survey participant.

IsTrueOrFalse.description: Response provided by a participant for a question type which has only two possible values: True and False.

NumberValue.description: Response provided by a participant for the following question types: Net Promoter Score (NPS) Rating Score Slider

QuestionChoiceId.description: The ID of SurveyQuestionChoice that a participant chose in response to a question.

QuestionId.description: The ID of the SurveyQuestion that a participant provided an answer for.

Rank.description: Rank provided by a participant for an answer choice for the ranking question type.

ResponseId.description: The ID of the SurveyResponse that is the parent of this SurveyQuestionResponse.

ResponseShortText.description: Up to the first 250 characters of the response provided by a participant for a text type question.

ResponseValue.description: Response provided by a participant for a question.

SurveyVersionId.description: The ID of the SurveyVersion that the response belongs to.
